meaningMnemonic: You're <kanji>clever</kanji> and <kanji>bright</kanji> so obviously you're going to make <vocabulary>wise</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>sensible</vocabulary> decisions. In fact, when you go to make these very wise choices and observations, your brain glows brightly.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
